name: SARSCoronavirus2RNAPanels
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 RNA Panels
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to panels containing results for the detection of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), in various specimens.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes panels containing results for the detection of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), in various specimens.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
